bulletins.title: Engine coolant blower motor(s) not working.
problems: Engine coolant blower motor(s) not working.
Engine coolant blower motor(s) run continuously.
causes: Faulty capacitor in engine coolant blower motor.

steps: Fit modified engine coolant blower motor(s).

bulletins.title: Engine coolant blower motor(s) run continuously.
problems: Engine coolant blower motor(s) not working.
Engine coolant blower motor(s) run continuously.
causes: Faulty capacitor in engine coolant blower motor.

steps: Fit modified engine coolant blower motor(s).

bulletins.title: Intermittent self-activation of alarm system siren.
problems: Intermittent self-activation of alarm system siren.
causes: Unsatisfactory design of alarm system in car movement sensor.

parts.name: Alarm system in car movement sensor

steps: Carry out electrical, mechanical and component tests (as applicable) to eliminate any other possible cause(s).
If no fault(s) found:Remove interior lamps assembly.Fit new alarm system in car movement sensor Fig.1234930.1.
Fit new alarm system in car movement sensor Fig.1234930.1.
Fit new alarm system in car movement sensor Fig.1234930.1.
